attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
FLUORIDISATION of our Drinking Water.   
Water companies should supply a clean, safe potable source of water. 
Government should enact legislation to control the water companies. 
The Government should not use the water supply to MEDICATE the population without their consent. 
Fluoride is banned throughout continental Europe, China and Japan. In the remaining five countries that still add fluoride to water opposition is growing as people see the harm fluoride can do. 
Five million people in Britain are still forced to drink fluoride-polluted water. 
The British government is considering a change in the law to compel all water companies in Britain to add fluoride to ALL our water supplies. Science shows that fluoride is a CUMULATIVE, protoplasmic poison. 
Several water companies responded to customers' wishes and refused to fluoridate.
Does Government have the RIGHT to mass medicate or treat individuals without their consent?    NO IT DOES NOT
We urge MPs and Councillors to uphold the rights of their Constituents. VOTE "NO" to fluoridation.
